title: RIOT PLEASE BUFF GRAVES HIS WINRATE HAS GONE DOWN TO 30 HE'S TOO WEAK
body: Please buff graves riot he's so weak after you needed him too unfairly

replies.body: what OP is trying to say is he's been losing a lot of games with graves, his actual winrate is still over 50%.

Graves has a 52% win rate in adc role, 51% win rate in top role and 48% win rate in the jungle role

http://champion.gg/champion/Graves/ADC

I think he is in a good spot. His win rate is no where near the 30's

yes the Q has been made weaker
but he is not that weak in any regard...
perhaps you need to get us to the delay of Q's rebound? 
or?
Graves is still as powerful as he has ever been, its just his early game isn't as strong as what it use to be.

lol, he is still as strong, he just needs actual skill now instead of spamming noobs, the only difference is he was given outplay against a wall, where they get a tiny as window of opportunity to dodge it
